entry.dcterms:title: Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Youth Survey 1995. Research about the life style, social, demographic, economic and cultural characteristics of the Hungarian population below 30 years.
entry.dcterms:creator: Nagy, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F45: Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Youth Survey 1995. Research about the life style, social, demographic, economic and cultural characteristics of the Hungarian population below 30 years.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Bukodi, Erzsébet
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Central Statistical Office Department of Social Statistics
entry.dcterms:description: survey about the life style, social-demographic characteristics, economic and cultural characteristics, leisure time spending habits of the population between 0-30 years; other topics included the role of child care institutions, rearing children, studies in school, job and marriage history of young adults
entry.dcterms:subject: community, urban and rural life
income, property and savings
education, school
society and culture
family life, marriage, relationship
labour and employment
health condition
social stratification and groupings
social conditions and indicators
law, crime and legal systems
persons and households
survey data
cross-section

The basic population includes the Hungarian population having a place of residence in Hungary, but not in institutional households, aged 0-30 years. Household-based national representative sample. In all households all persons between 0-30 years. (in the case of minors the parents answered the questions.) Response rate was appr. 75%.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
